questions.question: Why do we use Sine bars to find angles?

answers.c: To set workpieces at specific angles

questions.question: Which type of workpieces are commonly measured using a sine bar?
What are the sources of errors in sine bars?

answers.b: Imperfections in the surface plate, wear in the sine bar, deviations in slip gauges, levelling issues
